StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [InsertUpdateOssEventOwners]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@EventId uniqueidentifier, @Owners xml, @LastUpdatedBy uniqueidentifier
AS BEGIN
BEGIN TRANSACTION
DELETE FROM [RSSOSS].[USMC].[EventOwners] WHERE EventID = @EventId
INSERT INTO [RSSOSS].[USMC].[EventOwners] ([ID] ,[EventID] ,[OwnerID] ,[CreatorID] ,[LastUpdateDate] ,[LastUpadteUserID])
Select newid() ,@EventId ,ParamValues.guid.value('.','char(36)') ,ParamValues.guid.value('.','char(36)') , getdate() ,@LastUpdatedBy from @owners.nodes('/ArrayOfGuid/guid') as ParamValues(guid)
-- Rollback the transac.on if there were any errors IF @@ERROR <> 0 BEGIN -- Rollback the transac.on ROLLBACK TRANSACTION
-- Raise an error and return RAISERROR ('Error occurred while performing the change.', 16, 1) RETURN END
-- If we reach this point, the commands completed successfully -- Commit the transac.on.... COMMIT TRANSACTION
END
